subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan scored the first 5 points of overtime, and San Antonio rallied from an 18-point deficit to beat Memphis, 104-93, and move a win from the N.B.A. Finals.
snippet: Tim Duncan scored the first 5 points of overtime, and San Antonio rallied from an 18-point deficit to beat Memphis, 104-93, and move a win from the N.B.A. Finals.
